title: We Left Our Hearts In Texas (w/ Shane Gillis, Mike Vecchione & Justin Silver)
description: Dan & Jay catch up with the crew about their after show adventures in Austin. Justin Silver & Mike Vecchione come by and get into the documentary "One Of Us" about the Hasidic community in New York. Heel Jacob comes out for the Bonfire Dating Game from the live show at the Moontower Comedy Festival.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
